app_detail:
Cool, Simple, Stylish and 100% FREE!! Emoji Keyboard Lite Emoticons is the Best Free Lightweight Keyboard Apps for Google Android smartphones and tablets.

Emoji Keyboard Lite Emoticons helps you type fast and makes your Keyboard show up faster. When using Emoji Keyboard Lite Emoticons, you can save space, there will be more RAM and CPU resources available for running games and other apps more smoothly.

At the same time, Emoji Keyboard Lite Emoticons supports the latest emoji & emoticons: "LIVE EMOJI" "Sexy Emoji" "Color Emoji" "GLITTER EMOJI" "EMOTIONAL EMOJI" "ZOMBIE EMOJI" ...etc. Also, you can send classic emoji, like unicorn, Taco, Nerd Face in various emoji stylesğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‡ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

Emoji Keyboard Lite Emoticons helps you send 3000+ funny emoji, emoticons and cool Gifs emoji stickers by any smartphone devices. Easy to share fancy emoticons and smiley text faces onto SMS, Email and any social apps like Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram Twitter etc.

ğŸ€Keyboard Key FeaturesğŸ€

â˜… Fast Input 3000+ Emoji, Emoticons, Symbol
- Text faces including Ù©(â™¡Îµâ™¡)Û¶ ï¼¼(Âº â–¡ Âº l|l)/
- More than 3000+ latest & cute emoji are able to be sent on Facebook, Messenger, Snapchat, Gmail, Kik and so on.
- Smart emoji prediction helps you to find accurate emoticons for typing faster.
- Emoji art, Emoji style

ğŸ˜ Perfect Keyboard Customization
- Resize and split keyboard layout as you thought.
- Customizable keyboard colors, fonts and keyboard wallpapers & backgrounds.
- Select your favorite photo as keyboard theme or take photos directly.
- Support QWERTY, QWERTZ and AZERTY keyboards.

ğŸ˜ Stunning Keyboard Themes
- Over 1000 colorful & stylish keyboard themes, all you can download free.
- Easy to find what kind of themes you want by large variety of categories.

ğŸ˜² Fast Typing & Smart Input
- Fast input emoji & number in keyboard
- Type faster with smart Auto correction & word prediction
- Swipe to type. Gesture Typing with dynamic floating effect

ğŸ˜‡ Other Advanced Features
- Keyboard Android 6.0 Material UI Style
- Always display capital letter when typing
- Copy, cut, paste directly from keyboard
- Bottom row arrow key in keyboard
- Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste in keyboard

ğŸ˜˜ Compatible with most Android phones
Samsung Galaxy S8 & S8 Edge, Samsung Galaxy Note7, Note 6, Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge, Samsung Galaxy J7;
Huawei P10 & P10 Plus, Huawei P9, Huawei P8, Huawei Mate 9, Huawei Mate 8, Huawei Honor 8;
Sony Xperia Z5, Sony Xperia Z4;
HTC 10, HTC One A9, HTC Desire 10 Pro;
OPPO Find 9;
Mi Mix;
LG;
Vivo; etc.

Keyboard Data Collection Warning
We will never collect userâ€™s personal information such as passwords or sensitive data. On the Android system, a warning message is automatically displayed for all keyboard applications during installation, but please be assured of its safety.

Attention:
Due to the deviceâ€™s Operation System (below android 4.4), the colorful emoji may not work as well on your original apps (message) while it may work better on third-party apps (Facebook, Messenger, etc).

* Connect SNS (ex: facebook, instagram, twitter ...)
